title: Step 17

challengeFiles.name: main

tests.text: You should create an if statement that checks if root is None.
You should pass the argument f'Failed to converge within {max_iterations} iterations.' to the print function.

description: Outside the for loop, create an if statement to check if the value of root is still None. If it is, print the message 'Failed to converge within {max_iterations} iterations.'. Remember to format the message using an f-string.
